page.title: Logging into VCell
page.introduction: The first time a user launches VCell, a dialog window appears for login options.

list.item: Login redirects the user to the default browser of the local computer to authenticate using Auth0. At first use the user will be prompted to create a Profile in Auth0 that will link to the user's VCell Username. See the Auth0 Profile Instructions .
Guest logs in as the VCell Guest User (VCell Guest) and allows limited access to VCell to allow exploration of public VCell models.

Skip dismisses the dialog and allows "offline" use of VCell, without connection to the servers or databases. Any models created in an "offline" mode need to be exported to VCML or SBML to be saved locally. The user can log in at any time using the "Account Login" menu item.
